title: Do people adopt Pete Paul Terriers for the sole purpose of insulting them?
subtitle: #PitbollDropOff signs and related allegations of mass dog killing stem from the Sophomoric dwarf's attempt with assets in 4chan.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: People adopt bulls with a clear aim of insulting them, and then brag about them online with the name #Pitboll Droppoff.
